referenceFunction.name: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified {RER}| transport, freight, lorry, all sizes, EURO6 to generic market for | APOS, U
referenceFunction.localName: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified {RER}| transport, freight, lorry, all sizes, EURO6 to generic market for | APOS, U

geography.text: The inventory is modelled for Europe

representativeness.extrapolations: This dataset has been extrapolated from year 2015 to the year of the calculation (2021). The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

person.name: Tereza Levova levova@ecoinvent.org Technoparkstr. 1, 8005 Zurich, Switzerland is active author: True

exchange.name: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified {RER}| transport, freight, lorry, all sizes, EURO6 to generic market for | APOS, U
transport, freight, lorry >32 metric ton, euro6 {RER}| market for transport, freight, lorry >32 metric ton, EURO6 | APOS, U
exchange.generalComment:
(1,1,3,1,1,na) Calculated from the production volumes.
The production volume is taken from the ""transport, freight, lorry, ..., EURO3"" activities. There the production volumes for Europe are taken from the TREMOVE project and the GLO production volumes are calculated using GDP scaling. If the GDP of the whole world (GLO) is 1 the GDP of Europe (RER) is 0.289.
It is estimated, that 10% of this transport is used for transport of goods in need of atmosphere control. And thus this production volume is included in the ""transport, freight, lorry ... with refrigeration machine"" datasets.
It is also estimated, that 50% of the production volume of this transport is transfered to the generic market for transport, freight, lorry, unspecified. Which means, that 50% of people using this transport do not know or do not care about the size of the vehicle and the EURO class.
